Text: FW Press Release Notification The following Press Release cleared US PR Newswire at the time specified below Press Release August AM EST Compaq Strengthens EMEA Management Team August Compaq Strengthens EMEA Management Teamdoc August Compaq Strengthens EMEA Management Teamdoc
CTO Press Release ShaneRobisondoc Shaneletterfinaldoc ShaneRobisondoc Shaneletterfinaldoc

Michael Cappellas Cc is from Tom Siekman and Yvonne Jackson We are pleased to tell you that the new employment agreement with Michael has been finalized As we are certain you will agree this is an exciting point in Compaqs history and we are looking forward to Michaels continued leadership Please let us know if you have any questions

FW CEO Org Chart Cc an updated senior management org chart with admins names phonefax numbers and mail codes If you have any questions please feel free to call Thanks Sandy Original Message From Rohde Lisa Sent Wednesday March AM To HOU CEOSec Subject CEO Org Chart cap orgasstsppt Lisa Rohde Executive Assistant Office of Michael Capellas President CEO Compaq Computer Corporation phone fax mailto cap orgasstsppt

FW Please Issue to bod Cc Tom by fax to Peter Larson Original Message From Capellas Michael D Sent Tuesday November PM To Siekman Tom Subject Please Issue to bod This morning Rich Gardner of SSB issued a negative report on the segment and specifically called out us He sited high channel inventory parts shortages and general demand Report also called out Dell We issued statement around midday This is the same analyst that called out stuffing last quarter To say we are annoyed would be a gross understatement and we are being as aggressive as we can be within limits of disclosure I will make some personal visits this week It is a real nervous market

FW CEO Org Chart Cc an updated senior management org chart with admins names phonefax numbers and mail codes If you have any questions please feel free to call Thanks Sandy Original Message From Rohde Lisa Sent Wednesday March AM To HOU CEOSec Subject CEO Org Chart cap orgasstsppt Lisa Rohde Executive Assistant Office of Michael Capellas President CEO Compaq Computer Corporation phone fax mailto cap orgasstsppt

Michael Cappellas Cc is from Tom Siekman and Yvonne Jackson We are pleased to tell you that the new employment agreement with Michael has been finalized As we are certain you will agree this is an exciting point in Compaqs history and we are looking forward to Michaels continued leadership Please let us know if you have any questions

FW Please Issue to bod Cc Tom by fax to Peter Larson Original Message From Capellas Michael D Sent Tuesday November PM To Siekman Tom Subject Please Issue to bod This morning Rich Gardner of SSB issued a negative report on the segment and specifically called out us He sited high channel inventory parts shortages and general demand Report also called out Dell We issued statement around midday This is the same analyst that called out stuffing last quarter To say we are annoyed would be a gross understatement and we are being as aggressive as we can be within limits of disclosure I will make some personal visits this week It is a real nervous market
